jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Manage brand’s social media accounts (daily and campaigns) 
● Identify content to post 
● Work with content writer, designer and project team to produce content 
● Schedule all posts to the various networks 
● Monitor and respond to comments and enquiries, engage in dialogues where its appropriate 
● Proactively engage with followers and relevant communities 
● Provide insights on what content will work well on social media 
● Identify brand’s KOL, ambassador candidates 
● Work with teams across the organization to ensure success (KPI) 
● Become ‘the bridge’ to support on-going communication between brand and its consumer 
● Monitoring social media trends 
● Track and observe new tools, trends and application 
● Involve in all phases of social media activity from brainstorm, execution, and also observation to gain insights.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

• At least 2-3 Years related experience from Advertising Agency or Start-Ups
  • Strong team player
  • Creative and Innovative
  • Result oriented with attention to detail
  • Ability to work independently to tight deadlines
  • Strong written, editing, and proof-reading skills
  • A social media users
  • Broad knowledge of social media landscape, platform(s), and technologies
  • Strong passion in digital particularly social media and willingness to learn
